Package jchain.bc

Class BC

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchain.bc.BC
  • public class BC
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a means to create an (currently) in-memory blockchain.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BC​(Block initialBlock)
      Returns an instance of a BC object with an initial block.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • BC

        public BC​(Block initialBlock)
        Returns an instance of a BC object with an initial block.
        Parameters:
        initialBlock - A genesis block for the blockchain.

    • Method Detail

      • addBlock

        public void addBlock​(Block block)
        Adds a block to the blockchain. Block integrity is enforced with this method, in that the block to be added must have the current lead block's hash pointed to by it's block header.
        Parameters:
        block - A Block object. pointed to by the block's header is not the same as the lead block's hash.

      • getBlockByHash

        public Block getBlockByHash​(java.lang.String hash)
                     throws NoSuchBlockException
        Tries to get a block via the blocks hash. Will return null if there is no block found with the given hash.
        Parameters:
        hash - A block hash (as a hexstring).
        Returns:
        A block whose hash matches the indicated hash.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBlockException - If there is not block in the blockchain with the indicated hash.

      • getBlockByHeight

        public Block getBlockByHeight​(int height)
                       throws NoSuchBlockException
        Tries to get a block from the blockchain by height.
        Parameters:
        height - The height to retrieve at.
        Returns:
        The block at the given height in the blockchain.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBlockException - If there is no block in the blockchain at the indicated height.

      • getLeadBlock

        public Block getLeadBlock()
        Gets the lead block in the chain.
        Returns:
        The lead block in the blockchain.

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Gets the height (# of blocks) of the blockchain.
        Returns:
        The number of blocks in the blockchain.

      • getTransactionByHash

        public Transaction getTransactionByHash​(java.lang.String hash)
                                 throws NoSuchTransactionException
        Tries to get a transaction via its hash. Will return null if no transaction was found with the given hash.
        Parameters:
        hash - A SHA-256 double hash.
        Returns:
        A Transaction whose hash matches the given hash.
        Throws:
        NoSuchTransactionException - If there is no transaction in the blockchain with the indicated hash.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
